item.title: B3 - Stock returns - ongoing project
item.description: We start by defining which tickers are we going to consider in our analysis. The file “tickers.xlsx” has tickers from B3 stocks that were active in the stock exchange as of april 2018. Download tickers.xlsx We will read it with the function read_excel, from the amazing readxl package https://readxl.tidyverse.org/ library(readxl) Brazilian stocks are found in yahoofinance with an added “.SA”. So, we add that suffix to the tickers, creating the codigo column in our tickers dataframe.
